question: I was recently told I have vascultits. I am very concerned because blood work is negative, no lupos, diabetes, brain tumors, arthritis; I am scheduled to see a neurologist in a few weeks. My eyesight hasn't been infected.  I complained only of headaches; referred to eye doctor and now told I have vasculitis and a swollen optical nerve.  what has happened to me?
title: Vascultis - Optical Nerve
